title: Arm support
body:
Can you also compile and publish for arm ? 
thanks
author: Youssef-Harby

comments.body:
Hello @Youssef-Harby the extension is available for all platforms/archs except `windows_amd64_mingw`
What version of DuckDB are you using? Please provide all details as well as the error you're receiving. Thanks!

Hello @lmangani .. thanks for reply
1.1.3 on macos 15.2 (24C101)
The osx builder is most definitely there. Please show the full output when attempting to install the extension including all errors, etc.
after restart it works after downgrading from duckdb dev channel to 1.1.3 .. thanks !!
Thanks @Youssef-Harby indeed the current community repository only offers builds for the last "stable" build of DuckDB and not for dev builds. Hope it'll be useful ðŸ‘‹

title: Funtions return response data as a JSON instead of the body
author: ahuarte47
